name: investment-tracker
description: A comprehensive investment portfolio tracking application with server-client-database architecture

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install

author: Investment Tracker Team
